description: This file contains unit tests for the DataElement and related classes in the core module, using Google Test framework. It tests methods like Copy, Size, CRC32, Buffer access, SearchNumber, SetNumber, SetBitNumber, Set, Align, and linked data operations.

classes.name: DataElement
classes.description: Class representing a data element with methods for copying, resizing, CRC calculations, buffer management, searching, setting values, bit operations, and validation.

classes.name: DataStore
classes.description: Class managing a data buffer with copy and size methods.

classes.name: DataElementParser
classes.description: Parser class for DataElement instances with validation and size retrieval.

classes.name: LinkedDataElement
classes.description: Class representing linked data elements with buffer management and relationships.

methods.name: Copy
methods.description: Copies data into DataElement or DataStore.

methods.name: Size
methods.description: Gets or sets the size of the data buffer.

methods.name: Buffer
methods.description: Provides access to the data buffer.

methods.name: SearchNumber
methods.description: Searches for a number in DataElement with specific endianess.

methods.name: SetNumber
methods.description: Sets a number at a specific position in DataElement with endianess.

methods.name: GetNumber
methods.description: Retrieves a number at a specific position in DataElement with endianess.

methods.name: Search
methods.description: Searches for a byte array in DataElement.

methods.name: SetBitNumber
methods.description: Sets bits in DataElement at specified position and length.

methods.name: Set
methods.description: Sets a byte value at a specific offset in DataElement.

methods.name: Align
methods.description: Aligns DataElement data to a byte boundary.

methods.name: Enclosed
methods.description: Marks a LinkedDataElement as enclosed within another.
